about_the_game:
Based on real-life events with absurdity cranked up to a 100, Covid19 - Toilet Paper Run has you, well, make a run to get toilet paper. Jeff is down to his last roll and the world is quickly running out of stock thanks to hoarders!

Luckily, one of the last places to still have the paper is right across the city square. Unluckily, infected people are still carelessly roaming around outside. Can he make a run without getting infected himself?





There are three simple goals in this short third person shooter:

1. Run to the store on the other side of city square
2. Run back to your apartment with toilet paper
3. DON'T GET INFECTED (actually, this really should be #1)

With Covid-19 viruses everywhere, you better be careful. A single virus is enough to get you infected, unless you manage to find some sort of protection that enables you to take a few virus hits. Spray bottles are your best friend. Wierdly enough, they never seem to run out of hand sanitizer, so make sure to use it in healthy doses!






Everyday household item turned into weapon! Use sanitizer filled spray bottles to destroy any approching viruses trying to infect you in a disinfecting frenzy that might just have you break world record in mouse clicks per second (if you actually do this, the game will break. There you go, an extra challenege!)





Whatever your opinion on use of face masks was, here they defintely help. They are Jeff's only line of defense against the virus, so make sure to pick up as many as you can find!






Not all shooters need to be about killing monsters, aliens, robots or other people. Here you get to annihilate something that more than likely affected you in real life - coronavirus. Be careful! They have strenght in numbers and will do their best to infect you!

name: Covid19 - Toilet Paper Run

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2300 | AMD FX-4350
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 660, 2 GB | AMD Radeon HD 7870, 2 GB
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-8400 | AMD Ryzen 5 2600X
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 1060 | AMD Radeon RX 580
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: Set in the early stage of COVID-19 pandemic, this third person "shooter" has you disinfect your way through coronavirus infested city square using hand sanitizer filled spray bottles. Now's your chance to get back at the virus that affected us all (and help Jeff get some toilet paper in the process)
